title: Complete Medieval Music Collection
description: The Complete Medieval Music Collection is a high-quality bundle of 5 music packs (89 total tracks) crafted for royalty-free use in video games.
longDescription:
Discover the Complete Medieval Music Collection – an epic anthology perfect for bringing your medieval game to life. With 89 tracks spanning over 2 hours, this collection offers loopable, high-quality music that transports players to a world of knights, castles, and epic battles. Tracks include variations to keep your game’s soundtrack fresh and immersive. Enhance your game’s atmosphere with authentic medieval soundscapes that capture the era's essence. 


Preview: https://youtu.be/-V8otJCuiPo?si=_NeCZMVTA9dhgG1G

https://youtu.be/oDBE8XmxnZ4?si=MLVJmhyNGDlFDoVM

https://youtu.be/u256yYy9kbY?si=0pmF-00FldCbwp_m

https://youtu.be/6EFDrtMzeG0?si=BpGh-FYg-CFrHLKR

https://youtu.be/t-dmZB58Dl8?si=FxvuCLt5aY3OHzDj


This bundle features 5 music packs:


Feudal Game Music - https://link.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/feudal-game-music

Medieval Action - https://link.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/medieval-action-music-themes-and-variations

Medieval Game Music - https://link.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/medieval-game-music

Medieval Traditional Music - https://link.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/medieval-traditional-music

Medieval Village Music - https://link.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/medieval-village-music-themes-and-variations


Bring your medieval game to life with this unparalleled collection!


For a truly unique gaming experience, tailor-made just for you, inquire about custom music and sound effects. Contact me at iustingaleaoficial@gmail.com to bring your vision to life through enchanting audio.
technicalDetails:
Features:


  • 89 original high-quality WAV tracks (16-bit / 44.1 kHz)
  • 2+ hours of music
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free license

Number of Audio Wavs: 89

Number of Audio Cues: 89

Sample rate / bit rate: 16-bit / 44.1 kHz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 121

Supported Development Platforms: Android, Gear VR, HoloLens 2, HTML5, iOS, Linux, MacOS, Nintendo Switch, Oculus, PlayStation 4, Steam VR, Windows 32-bit, Windows 64-bit, Xbox One

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
